## ConstructorFunction interface

Interface for constructor functions without `new` operator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConstructorFunction<T> 
```

## Example


```ts
function Foo(x) {
  if (!(this instanceof Foo)) { return new Foo(x); }
  this.x = x;
}

```
